Jazkallah for the question you have sent to the institute. You write about the difficulties in your relationship with your husband.%0D%0A%0D%0AI would like to know if your husband's attitude towards you has been like this always or is it since he has had his heart problem only? Is your husband able to go out to work and is he earning the same amount as he did before he became ill? I am also wondering if his medication is causing him to become depressed and perhaps if this is the reason why he is taking out his frustration and anger out on you. Have you discussed his attitude with his doctor?
